string.text: Nemiroff vodka

Nemiroff is a Ukrainian producer of alcoholic beverages, specialising in vodkas and other spirits, based in the town of Nemyriv in the Vinnytska oblast. One of the best vodkas in the world and - by extension - in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]NOTE:
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]It is commonly known that this brand of alcohol is preferred by the Ecologist's chef at Yantar. Rumours exist that he'll happily smuggle military gear into the hands of common stalkers in exchange for a few swigs from a bottle, but such stories have yet to be substantiated.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong alcohol
Putinka vodka

Following the tradition of naming vodka brands after Russian leaders, Putinka first went into production after Vladimir Putin was elected president. Produced in Russia from the finest grain and crystal clear water from Siberian springs. Triple purification, smooth texture, unique taste are not the only characteristics of this beverage. Drink with moderation.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong alcohol
Stolichnaya vodka

A favourite amongst Russians and many people the world over. Un vodka ruso de alta calidad. Muy popular en la Zona y ampliamente disponible, probablemente debido a una conexión externa de uno de los comerciantes. In order to avoid detection by the military units stationing around the Zone, it is usually shipped in army containers or metal barrels, and then distributed in sturdy metal bottles.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong alcohol
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Ukrainian beer

Cerveza ucraniana. Another - beside vodka - popular beverage in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] light alcohol
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Metal bottle

Botella de metal que contiene una ración de lo que parece ser un vodka producido en la Zona. It doesn't smell right and the fumes are strong.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong, low quality alcohol
Strong energy drink

Often used by stalkers on long trips due to its exhilarating effect when you're tired. The drink also sobers you up a bit if you're drunk as well as induces the release of adrenaline into the bloodstream. Do not overdose.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Agua purificada

Cantimploras militares destinadas a almacenar pequeñas cantidades de agua. Preparado por médicos y científicos. Primero, el agua, combinada con un tipo especial de alcohol, se hierve a una temperatura muy alta para la purificación y desinfección. Afterwards, it is cooled in refrigerators, to which it owes its refreshing "spark." El resultado final es agua completamente libre de radiación. Si a pesar de lo anterior, todavía tiene dudas sobre su pureza, siempre puede usar akvatab (desinfectante). Debido al coste de producción, las cantimploras militares tienen un suministro limitado y se venden a un precio moderado. Medics also have them in stock, but they're slightly more expensive as they include the cost of transportation.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Paquete de carne vieja

Un paquete que contiene una ración de pan viejo y algo de carne maloliente de origen desconocido envuelta en papel marrón. The look and smell suggest that some of it is moldy.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] low quality
Beard's tea

Beard's popular hot tea made from a mixture of sugar, edible dried mushrooms and boiled water that is said to be radiation-free. Los stalkers que pueden permitirse comprar la bebida a menudo la toman para viajes largos en la Zona. It's a good and healthy way to stay on your toes when you're getting tired or when you're out exploring on cold nights.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Tomates enlatados

Los tomates enlatados, cortados en rodajas y cortados en cubitos se importan regularmente a la Zona. The best before date on the bottom suggests they're still fresh.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Salchicha ahumada

Hecho de carne de res y cerdo. Ahumado y empacado al vacío, puede conservarse durante largos períodos de tiempo. Esta pieza en particular ha sido importada de la Federación Rusa. Famous among certain Russian mafia leaders for its exceptional flavour and taste.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Maíz enlatado

Maíz dulce enlatado importado del exterior. Can be eaten as it is, but there are some who use it as a soup ingredient.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Judias cocidas

Judías cocidas conservadas importadas de occidente. These haricot beans in tomato sauce may bring back nice memories to some people.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Judias con chili

Judias con chili en conserva importadas de occidente. Popular as an ingredient in some dishes in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Lata de atún

The best before date at the back of the tin can indicates that you shouldn't expect delicacies.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
"Abakan" beef tushonka

Tushonka is a common name of canned, stewed meat produced in the Soviet Union and other Warsaw Pact countries. The irony is that the idea originally came to Russia in a form of World War II aid transports from the United States. Since then, various kinds of tushonkas have become a primary means of long-time meat preservation, used both by the civilian population and as a standard-issue Red Army food ration. Despite their long expiry date, tushonkas are known for their high nutrition value (mostly owing to high fat content) and a relatively good taste. La zona de exclusión de Chernobyl ha visto cientos de tipos y gustos de tushonkas. In the spring of 2013 'Abakan' minced-meat brand remains the unquestionable king, and certainly the Zone has seen worse than that.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Salmón ahumado

Salmón ahumado ucraniano. As soon as it's brought to the Zone, the fish changes hands until it finds its way to the highest bidder. Very valuable.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Pasas

Un paquete de pasas. Rich in nutrients, balances sugar in the blood.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Russian chocolate

Muy raro en la Zona y bastante valioso, aunque su sabor no es nada especial. Brings back many fond childhood memories, which may help soothe the pain of living in the harsh and unforgiving conditions of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Russian chocolate (half-consumed)

Muy raro en la Zona y bastante valioso, aunque su sabor no es nada especial. Brings back many fond childhood memories, which may help soothe the pain of living in the harsh and unforgiving conditions of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Altoids

Mint-flavoured altoids imported from the West. Son muy refrescantes y eliminan las partículas de radiación de la boca. También parecen reducir la somnolencia por un tiempo breve. You can take as many as 10 mints at a time but that's only because your mouth isn't able to fit any more.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Mixed nuts

Cacahuetes variados, avellanas, anacardos y almendras en una mezcla agradable y popular. El valor nutricional es bastante alto. Imported from South Africa.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Agua mineral

Agua mineral de manantiales ucranianos. Carbonated and with additional calcium.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
MRE

The Meal, Ready-to-Eat (commonly known as the MRE) is a self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging, developed by the United States military for its service members for use in combat or other field conditions where organised food facilities are not available. Una MRE se puede usar como una sola comida. El empaquetado de un MRE está diseñado para soportar condiciones difíciles y la exposición a los elementos. Contiene un plato junto con una variedad de otros alimentos y bebidas. While it can be eaten cold, it usually tastes much better when heated up with the included flameless ration heater (FRH, a water-activated exothermic reaction device that emits heat).
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military ration

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] 3 portions in one package. 1398 kcal in total
Russian IRP-B combat ration

Desayuno, comida y cena todo en un paquete. Includes various food items whose function is to provide the body with all minerals and microelements essential for your health as well as cooking equipment (small metal frame, fuel tablets, matches, striker) and other items (e.g. napkins) facilitating use in field conditions. Viene con una caja polimérica que protege los ingredientes de condiciones ambientales peligrosas. The polymeric box has 3 sections, each respectively for breakfast, dinner and supper.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military ration
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7 portions in one package. 3661 kcal in total
Ukrainian combat ration

Esta ración de combate ucraniana se basa en una versión rusa anterior, y comprende latas disponibles comercialmente y alimentos secos empacados en una caja seccionada (parecida a una bandeja para llevar) hecha de plástico verde muy fino. Contains all that is necessary to provide a healthy adult with all calories and minerals needed during a single day.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military ration
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] 6 portions in one package. 3186 kcal in total
Bread loaf

A fine bread loaf baked by Nimble's wife living outside the Zone. It was the first commodity Nimble started to sell before his business expanded. Nowadays, he provides barkeepers with this fine bread, acting as an intermediary. After all, he has more pressing matters to attend to as he has his own company to manage.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Breadcrumbs

Crumbs of bread baked in the Great Land.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Barra de proteína de chocolate

Esta barra proporciona al cuerpo las proteínas y los azúcares necesarios que te dan un estímulo bienvenido. Useful on longer trips when you're on the go and need to eat something fast.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Agua con gas

Agua con gas para los stalkers sedientos. It has some exhilarating effect when you're tired.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
"The Beak"

"The Beak" is a powerful mixture of Zone-produced vodka and pulverised beak of a black crow. Not every beak can be used as an ingredient, because only black male crows that have lived in the Zone for more than 15 years have mutated sufficiently. El rumor dice que tales picos contienen una forma de proteína enriquecida que limpia cantidades moderadas de radiación del cuerpo. Some even say that drinking "the Beak" makes you feel like you have wings for a few seconds. On the downside, however, the taste itself is awful.\n
Cigarro cubano

This valuable Cuban cigar can bring you bliss for a short while, especially when you're admiring a nice sunset. Algunos stalkers notaron que fumar tabaco fuerte repele a los mosquitos. Los cigarros cubanos son considerados los mejores del mundo. A rare commodity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
Lucky Strike cigarettes

Cigarrillos importados de occidente. Some stalkers trade them for a few rounds of ammo within their faction.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Russian brand of cigarettes

El paquete de cigarrillos más barato de la Zona. Russian budget brand.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] low quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Soviet cigarettes

Un paquete de cigarrillos económicos, fuertes y de muy baja calidad. Alguien se debe haber fumado la mayoría de ellos ya que solo quedan unos pocos. Genuine USSR flavour has been carefully preserved.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Soviet cigarettes

Un paquete de cigarrillos económicos, fuertes y de muy baja calidad. Alguien se debe haber fumado la mayoría de ellos ya que solo quedan unos pocos. Genuine USSR flavour has been carefully preserved.

Soviet cigarettes

Un paquete de cigarrillos económicos, fuertes y de muy baja calidad. Alguien se debe haber fumado la mayoría de ellos ya que solo quedan unos pocos. Genuine USSR flavour has been carefully preserved.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Tabaco de liar

Preciado tabaco de liar, importado de occidente. With no additional ingredients, so it's possible to enjoy the original taste of tobacco leaf itself.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (roll up)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Cigarrillos Marlboro

Cigarrillos importados de occidente. Alguien se debe haber fumado la mayoría de ellos ya que solo quedan unos pocos. Smoking just one may stabilise your mental state and satisfies hunger a bit. They are rare in the Zone and quite valuable.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Tabaco ruso

Los cigarrillos son caros y raros en la Zona, y tener tabaco en bruto le permite producir sus propios cigarrillos a un costo menor. This tin is sealed, which ensures that the tobacco will stay fresh for days or weeks depending on the conditions it's kept in.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (roll up)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
